hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of allah sadi:"When you see the crescent then fast, and when you crescent then fast, and when you see it, stop fasting. If it is obscured from you (too cloudy), then fast thirty days

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الزُّهْرِيِّ فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Difference In Reports From Az-Zuhri
